author: TravisEz13
body:
cc @PowerShell/area-test , @PowerShell/area-documentation 
Adding tests to verify markdown syntax and basic style
Addresses #838

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: I'm looking at fixing the spelling errors revealed by fixing the syntax

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: The intent for the dev machine is to use this extension for VSCode:  https://marketplace.visualstudio.com/items?itemName=DavidAnson.vscode-markdownlint

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
@TravisEz13 Please push the change that remove `$null = ` for the `Start-Process` calls.
Then I will merge this PR after CI passed.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: restarted travis-ci macOS due to a myget failure

title: Add markdown lint test
